column1:
I condemn the heinous terrorist attack in Tel Aviv today, 0, 10
I send my deepest condolences to the families of those killed and I will continue to pray for the wounded, 10, 30
I stand in solidarity with the Israeli people in the face of these ongoing threats and in unwavering support of the countrys right to defend itself, 30, 56
Israels security must remain non-negotiable.
